message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid I'm not quite comfortable meeting you at $1400000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1800000. What do you think?

Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $1800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering at $1600000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I see you're willing to meet me halfway from your original offer, Bob. I appreciate that. However, I'm still not quite comfortable with $1600000. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $1700000. What do you think?

I understand you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'm counteroffering at $1650000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
